alert.note: Alert for Stearns (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 3:28PM CDT until July 24 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL STEARNS COUNTY... At 328 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Albany, or 19 miles west of St. Cloud, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... St. Anthony around 335 PM CDT. Avon around 340 PM CDT. Collegeville around 345 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Farming. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
